name: Budget App
occupation: Budget App is  a Javascript application. You can Keep record of monthly income and expenses. It will give percentages of your total expenses and even individual expenses.

name: Memory Game
occupation: Memory game is a React application. Images will shuffle every time user click on the image. If user clicks same image twice then game will end.

name: Face-fortune
occupation: Detect and analyze human faces within the image that you provided. Detect API can analyze detected faces directly, providing face landmarks and attributes information.

name: Friens Connector
occupation: Friends connector is a MERN application. A platform for friends to connect. They can create their profile, create post and chat.

name: Note-taker
occupation: This is a full stack web application.User can take a note,save a note and delete a note

name: Eat da Burger!
occupation: Eat-Da-Burger! is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. It is a full stack web application.

name: Bamazon
occupation: Bamazon CLI is a command-line interface Node.js application that runs a store called Bamazon. You are able to interact with the two sides of the store from the main menu as a Customer and Manager.

name: News Scraper
occupation: News-scrape is an app that pulls the latest articles from Wall Street Journal. User can take a note about the article. Save a note and delete article.
